original_text: Then they answered and said before the king, “Daniel, who is one of the exiles from Judah, pays no attention to you, O king, or the injunction you have signed, but makes his petition three times a day.”
korean_text: 그들이 왕 앞에서 말하여 이르되 왕이여 사로잡혀 온 유다 자손 중에 다니엘이 왕과 왕의 도장이 찍힌 금령을 존중하지 아니하고 하루 세 번씩 기도하나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then they answered and said before the king,
who is one of the exiles from Judah,
pays no attention to you, O king,
or the injunction you have signed,
but makes his petition three times a day.”
